alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Interior York; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:04AM EST until January 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER EXPECTED TO BRING SLIPPERY CONDITIONS TO THE AREA EARLY THIS AFTERNOON INTO TONIGHT... .Light to moderate snow will overspread New Hampshire and western Maine late this morning into the afternoon and continue into tonight, making for a slippery commute in the afternoon and evening hours. Some freezing rain is also possible this evening and tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
